belowBelowName: If you seek a devoted and innovative developer capable of bringing your ideas to fruition, you've arrived at the right place.
title: About Me
about: I pursued my studies in physics at Charles University in Prague, specializing in the interdisciplinary field of computer modeling for molecular dynamics. For my master's thesis, I focused on the topic of Computer Modeling of SARS-CoV-2 Protease Inhibition.

Driven by my passion, I subsequently ventured into the realm of web development. With a keen eye for detail and a commitment to staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends, I am constantly expanding my skill set to provide cutting-edge solutions.
